text: Thanasis Androutsos (, born 6 May 1997) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Olympiacos. ==Club career== ===Olympiacos=== On 18 August 2016, Androutsos made his debut with the club in a European match for UEFA Europa League play offs against Portuguese club Arouca as a late substitute.Αρούκα - Ολυμπιακός 0-1 Retrieved 18 August 2016 On 4 December 2016, he made his debut in the Super League as a late substitute in a 4–0 home win against Levadiakos. On 11 February 2017, he scored after 14 seconds, his first goal in the Super League in a 2–0 home win against AEL. ====Loan to Atromitos==== On 30 August 2019, Androutsos signed a long season deal with Atromitos on loan from Olympiacos.Ατρόμητος: Ανακοίνωσε τον δανεισμό του Ανδρούτσου Retrieved 30 August 2019 On 6 October 2019, he scored his first goal with Atromitos in a 2–3 away win against Volos.Βόλος - Ατρόμητος 2-3: Απόδραση με ανατροπή από το Πανθεσσαλικό Retrieved 6 October 2019 ==International career== On 15 March 2017, as an Olympiacos' youngster Androutsos' international call in Greece national football team was a big surprise by Michael Skibbe for Greece's crucial qualifier against Belgium. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- ! rowspan=2 | Club ! rowspan=2 | Season ! colspan=3 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Other ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
